quotes.quote: Effort plus persistence equals success.
Sleep might be the most important aspect of building a great business, and having a high-performing body.
quotes.author: Lewis Howes

quotes.quote: Do the best you can today, then do better tomorrow.
Don't die without fulfilling your purpose.
If you can't stop thinking about it, it's probably something worth going after.
If you aren't working for it, you'll end up working for someone who did.
Adversity will try to knock you off your square. Be a circle; spin and move.
The wiser you are, the less you speak.
Be an inspiration. You never know who is watching.
Dare to be different. Represent your maker well and you will forever abide in the beautiful embrace of his loving arms.
All the time that other people spend talking about their goals, I spend achieving my goals.
Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.
The only thing separating you from the life of your dreams is having the courage to work for it.
You have to learn the rules of the game. And then you have to play better than anyone else.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Results or excuses. You choose.
Collaborate with others to spark new concepts.
It's never a failure if you learn something from it.
Who dare tries is a success, and shall master the art of conquering dreams.
The heart and soul of a company is creativity and innovation.
You become what you think about.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Confidence is a lot of this game or any game. If you don't think you can, you won't.
quotes.author: Jerry West

quotes.quote: Discipline helps you do the right thing, even when you no longer feel like it.
Nothing is going to work out unless you step up and make it happen.
When you have a million dollar vision, don't surround yourself with 1 cent minds.
When your burning desire for success is greater than your deepest fear of failure, you can create anything in your life.
You're the only one who can make it happen. Go out there and get it done.
Remember that you are the only one in control of how you think and how you act on the road to success.
No one said the hustle would be easy, but it will definitely be worth it.
Don't get mad. Don't get even. Do better. Much better. Rise above. Become so engulfed in your own success that you forget it ever happened.
Get in touch with your passion and put it to work at work.
There's nothing stopping you from starting over. I know you'll succeed!
The man who does things makes mistakes, but he doesn't make the biggest mistake of all-doing nothing.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Don't take a job just because it's a job. Take a job because you want to learn something, because you want to become something.
Greatness means setting out to make some difference somewhere to someone in someplace.
quotes.author: Lolly Daskal

quotes.quote: I never dreamed about success. I worked for it.
quotes.author: Est√©e Lauder

quotes.quote: Nothing will ever be attempted if all possible objections must first be overcome.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Have a great idea? Work out the kinks and get it to market. The goal is to be the first one in your space.
If you don't work for what you want, you'll never have it.
You only fail if you don't try.
I'm convinced that about half of what separates the successful entrepreneurs from the non-successful ones is pure perseverance.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Work from a place of gratitude. You already have everything you need to thrive.
Don't make excuses for why you can't get it done. Focus on all the reasons why you must make it happen.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: We must always be mindful of who we are being while we are leading.
quotes.author: Lolly Daskal

quotes.quote: Developing strong interpersonal relationships by creating lasting connections instead of just passing acquaintances will take your business to a new level.
Hire character. Train skill.
quotes.author: Peter Schutz

quotes.quote: Never give someone the opportunity to waste your time twice.
The golden rule for every businessman is this: Put yourself in your customer's place.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: If you want to get ahead, pretend you are behind.
